item.title: Privacy
item.description: Privacy Policy TLDR: Website is hosted by Github, be aware of their privacy policy. If you don’t send me an e-mail, I won’t get or store data of you. Links can go elsewhere, be aware before clicking. Personal data (usually referred to just as "data" below) will only be processed by us to the extent necessary and for the purpose of providing a functional and user-friendly website, including its contents, and the services offered there.

item.title: My personal website
item.description: this website .. is still under construction. It shall remain static. summary Interested in everything that makes digital things better, safer and less cumbersome. From instruction sets and operating systems to programming languages and development processes, from writing a single good line of code to solving NP-hard problems. disclaimer This is my private website. Opinions expressed are my own and do not represent my employer. You can find my professional web representation here:
